enum  UL_INIT_FLAGS { UL_INIT_ALL = 0, UL_INIT_LIBONLY = 1 }

void ulInit (UL_INIT_FLAGS flags)

Detailed Description

Basic things about 킠ibrary.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum UL_INIT_FLAGS

Enumerator:
UL_INIT_ALL  Initialize all to get started easily.
UL_INIT_LIBONLY  Initialize the library only, IRQ init and powerOn will be done by yourself.

Function Documentation

void ulInit ( UL_INIT_FLAGS  flags  ) 

Initialization of the library.

Parameters:
flags 
  • Pass UL_INIT_ALL by default. 킠ibrary will initialize everything for you so that you can get started very easily.
  • Pass UL_INIT_LIBONLY if you want to initialize the strict minimum to get 킠ibrary running. Do that if you know what you are doing, or if you initialize 킠ibrary after PA_Lib.
